knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

This document is testing email suppression by modifying rmarkdown output 
metadata.

```{r}
Sys.time()
```

```{r}
email <- Sys.getenv("EMAIL", unset = NA)

if (is.na(email)) {
  cat("no email instructions.")
} else if (email == "true") {
  cat("email is true.")
  rmarkdown::output_metadata$set(rsc_email_suppress_scheduled = FALSE)
} else {
  cat("email is not true.")
  rmarkdown::output_metadata$set(rsc_email_suppress_scheduled = TRUE)
}
```
